import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import './index.css' function AppointmentHistoryModalContent() { let appointmentHistoryRedux = useSelector(state => state.appointmentHistory.selectedAppointment) let downloadFile = (file) => { window.open( file, "_blank"); } return (
Appointment ID - {appointmentHistoryRedux?.[0].appointmentId}
 
 
{appointmentHistoryRedux?.[0].appointmentDate}
For -
{appointmentHistoryRedux?.[0].doctorName}
No further input from your provider
 
 
 
{appointmentHistoryRedux?.[0].appointmentbookedDate}
Patient Name -
{appointmentHistoryRedux?.[0].patientName}
Reports from patient
    { appointmentHistoryRedux?.[0].reportDetails.length>0? appointmentHistoryRedux?.[0].reportDetails.map((element)=>{ return(
  • {downloadFile(element.filecontent)}}>{element.filename}
    • ) }) :null }
Other documents
  • Patient Consent Form
  • Consultation Invoice
End of Consultation
) } export default AppointmentHistoryModalContent
